summary: This is an email from July 21, 2019, regarding the addition of inmate Jeffrey Epstein to the Chaplaincy and Family Services Act (CFSA) roster at FCI Ray Brook. It contains a confidentiality notice and is part of the Epstein case document set.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: He is the inmate being added to the Chaplaincy and Family Services Act (CFSA) roster at FCI Ray Brook.

events.title: Epstein Added to CFSA Roster
events.description: Inmate Jeffrey Epstein was added to the Chaplaincy and Family Services Act (CFSA) roster at FCI Ray Brook, and an interview was conducted as part of the process.

locations: FCI Ray Brook, 128 Ray Brook Rd., Ray Brook, NY 12977
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was an inmate at FCI Ray Brook as of July 21, 2019.
He was added to the Chaplaincy and Family Services Act (CFSA) roster, indicating access to chaplain services.
The document is a sensitive communication from the U.S. Department of Justice with strict confidentiality warnings.
The email date (July 21, 2019) is shortly before Epstein's death in August 2019.
